name: Untitled Strategic Game
description:
This is the idea I was playing around. It is simple strategic, time dependent game. Inspired by Mini Motorways.

Your goal is to connect suppliers with factories and constant management of the supplies speed by changing distance of the connectors.

HOW TO PLAY:

Connect Triangle Factories with Circle Suppliers through Square Hubs.

LMB to spawn HUB.

LMB and DRAG on element to connect it with other element.

You have to connect all elements to other elements of the same color.

Set HUB's location so its number stays around 10.
If HUB's number reach 20 or go to 0 you lose.
